name: Survive Enemy Waves Shooter Game
description:
How many enemy waves can you survive?
You can play alone or with friends .

In Development - Sharing this to get some user experience comments 

Multiplayer Options :

  • Using Steam : If you host a game when you have steam connected on your computer your steam friends can find your hosted game (at the moment limited to 2 players)
  • Local Network - In case you are at home and you want to play with friends (without steam connected) you can share a game and connect up to 4 players to play with you .

Note - this game is not completed yet, more fixes are on the way .

Known issues :

  • Zoom animation - weapon holding need to be fixed
  • Enemy can pick powerups
